infobox.Japanese title:: おじゃマンボウ殺人事件  (Ojamanbō Satsujin Jiken)
infobox.Cast:: Conan Edogawa  Kogoro Mouri  Ran Mouri  Juzo Megure
infobox.Character design:: Masatomo Sudo  Takashi Hyodo (sub-character)  Yasuhiro Moriki (design works)
infobox.Voice Cast::
Voice Cast:



Minami Takayama as Conan Edogawa  Wakana Yamazaki as Ran Mouri  Akira Kamiya as Kogoro Mouri  Chafurin as Juzo Megure  Tsunehisa Fujii as Tsunehisa Fujii  Hideyuki Nakayama as Hideyuki Nakayama  Kuniko Asagi as Kuniko Asagi  Kumiko Tsunoda as Kumiko Nakayama  Isshin Chiba as Forensics officer  Eiji Ooki as Cleaning staff  Wataru Takagi as Detective, Next Conan's Hint

sections.Situation: Kogoro, Ran, and Conan are out jogging when they are attracted to a scene of a murder. One of the owners of the Ojamanbou Cleaning Company has been killed by a falling beam.
sections.People:
- Victim (crushed)
- 27 years old
- Ojamanbou Cleaning Company Eastern Branch vice-president
- 29 years old
- Ojamanbou Cleaning Company president
- 31 years old
- Ojamanbou Cleaning Company secretary
- Deceased (crushed)
- Hideyuki's younger sister and former secretary
- Construction company part-time worker
sections.Resolution:
Another piece of evidence is that the harmonica that the victim was supposedly picking up did not have any fingerprints from the victim nor the murderer.
Hideyuki had panicked, when Ran had unknowingly blocked the mirror he was using as a result he dropped the steel beam prematurely, before the victim had a chance to pick up the harmonica.
His motive was that Tsunehisa had broken up with Hideyuki's sister, causing her to quit Ojamanbou and suffer a fatal accident while working at a construction site in Yokohama. He learned about this through his sister's diary and along with Tsunehisa's Harmonica, that he decided it to use it to kill him in the process.
sections.Anime:
- The names of the characters in the Funimation Dub are:
- Tsunehisa Fujii - Phillip Baker
- Hideyuki Nakayama - Nathan Greene
- Kuniko Asagi - Catherine Madison
- Kumiko Nakayama - Crystal Greene
- Ojamanbou Cleaning Company - Sunfish Repair Works
sections.Trivia:
- This episode is a collaboration with Nippon TV's variety TV show TV Ojamanbou, which aired from July 1993 until March 2006. The case characters in this episode are named after the host and related staff of the TV show, who also participated as voice actor of their own character.
- Kogoro, Ran, and Conan are dressed with Saeki Sports club's gym suits from Sports Club Murder Case.
